TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithNonEquiJoinPredicate
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2), <($6, $4))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[AND(=(a, d), <(b, h))], join=[a, b, c, d, g, h], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- Calc(select=[d, g, h], where=[<(d, 2)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testFullOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[=(b, e)], join=[e, g, b, c], joinType=[FullOuterJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) : +- Calc(select=[e, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[b, c]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[=(a, d)], join=[d, g, a, c], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[=(a, d)], join=[a, c, d, g], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, c]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- Calc(select=[d, g], where=[<(d, 2)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testJoinWithMultipleKeys
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($1, $4))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[AND(=(a, d), =(b, e))], join=[d, e, g, a, b, c], joinType=[InnerJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, e]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, e, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[=(b, e)], join=[e, g, b, c], joinType=[RightOuterJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) : +- Calc(select=[e, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[b, c]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRightOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(where=[=(b, e)], join=[e, g, b, c], joinType=[LeftOuterJoin]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) : +- Calc(select=[e, g]) : +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_1]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[b, c]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])
